name: Super Blocks: Infinity Crush HD Free
name_original: Super Blocks: Infinity Crush HD Free
description:
Super Blocks : Infinity Crush HD is a puzzle game with simple control machine.
Find three or more cubes of the same color, whitch lie side by side and click on one of them to destroy.
The color blocks move upward, and your mission is : Do not let any cube touch the top!

You can choose between 3 modes.
1)Classic
2)Special - 5 different cubes and possibility to destroy 3x3 cubes with a bomb.
You get one more bomb every time when you destroy 5 or more cubes.
3)Time Trial - You have to be fast. There are only 3 different colors, but cubes are added very fast.
